blogging with jekyll

30 Nov 2011

I have decided to use jekyll to power this blog. Jekyll describes itself as a “blog aware, static site generator” written as a Ruby gem. Static site generators, like Jekyll, are gaining traction in the dev world…and it’s not because vintage is currently en vogue.

A static site generator parses and processes marked up textfiles into static HTML files. Jekyll... Read more
